recipesJson.name: Even Sides
recipesJson.author: Ebc88
recipesJson.description:
Strawberry custard I know its been done a million times but I mixed CAP SB RIPE & SWEET together and added some creams and it turned out quite nice.

No substitutes recommended CAP RIPE and TPA RIPE aren't the same, & same goes for CAP SWEET SB & TPA SWEET SB. The super sweet is optional

Steep time is 3-5 days. Tested on a Skyfall rda with a SS Alien 0.25 ohms 45-60 watts
